actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish an Executive Department to be known as the Department of Education.
subjects: Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

summary.text: Establishes the Department of Education within the Executive branch of the Federal Government to take over specified functions of the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare and all of the functions of the United States Office of Education. Establishes a Federal Interagency Committee on Education.

titles.title: A bill to establish an Executive Department to be known as the Department of Education.
